definition: Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Sierra Leone (Tw)/Shizishan or Lion Mountain/Shizishan district of Tongling city 銅陵市|铜陵市[Tong2 ling2 shi4], Anhui
Shizishan district of Tongling city 銅陵市|铜陵市[Tong2 ling2 shi4], Anhui
Lion Grove Garden in Suzhou, Jiangsu
Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
guardian lion, a lion statue traditionally placed at the entrance of Chinese imperial palaces, imperial tombs, temples etc
Snow lion, mythological animal, a banned symbol of Tibet and Tibetan Buddhism
Snow lion banner, banned flag of Tibetan independence movement, featuring mythological Snow Leopard

sentences.english: Unlike lions or cheetahs, leopards are secretive, solitary cats.
sentences.chinese: 花豹不像狮子或印度豹，是属于较神秘而隐居的大猫。

sentences.english: We may call this phenomenon catching the lion by its tail, and it is an unskillful thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以称之为抓住狮子的尾巴，这是不善巧的。

sentences.english: King Lion's Roar headed their number.
sentences.chinese: 国王狮子吼排在数字的前面。

sentences.english: Following the roar, out rushed a lion from among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 随着一声吼叫，呼地从树林里窜出一只狮子来。

sentences.english: Like lions we tow the line, blood-sewn pact with truth inside.
sentences.chinese: 我们像狮子一样拖行，血缝制协定真理内。

sentences.english: I was the lion who drove the jackals from you while you slept.
sentences.chinese: 我就是在你睡熟时替你驱逐豺狼的那头狮子。

sentences.english: Above and below the lions and bulls were wreaths of hammered work.
sentences.chinese: 边上有小座，狮子和牛以下有垂下的璎珞。

sentences.english: The kongoni are distracted, and the lion takes full advantage.
sentences.chinese: 东非狷羚分了神，而狮子全面利用了这一点。

sentences.english: Leo's also have the potential to become musical maestros .
sentences.chinese: 狮子座也有可能成为音乐大师。

sentences.english: Japan's new government Poodle or Pekinese?
sentences.chinese: 日本新政府到底是狮子狗还是京巴？

sentences.english: Today even Tibetan monks in Chinese areas carry Tibetan flags.
sentences.chinese: 现在，甚至到汉区的藏僧，都带著雪山狮子旗。

sentences.english: With Mars in Leo, you'll go after your goal with earnest.
sentences.chinese: 随着处在狮子宫的火星，你肯定能完成你的目标。

sentences.english: When he is walking in the grass, Big Lion catches him.
sentences.chinese: 当他在草丛里面散步的时候，大狮子逮住了他。

sentences.english: After three hours of digging, the lions finally extract the warthog.
sentences.chinese: 在三个小时的挖掘后，狮子们最终挖到了疣猪。

sentences.english: Other people like fish, caged birds, tortoises and even snakes, monkeys or lions.
sentences.chinese: 另一些喜欢鱼，鸟，龟甚至蛇，猴和狮子。

sentences.english: Leo will respect Virgo's clever and alert mentality.
sentences.chinese: 狮子座能尊重处女座的机智及警惕。
